document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Pembroke in the south.
document_data.name: Pembroke
document_data.mainbody: '''Pembroke''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Pembroke was located in southern Callidyrr in the county of [[Stirgewick]]. The town was situated near the center of the plains found between the [[Dernall Forest]] and [[Rushdown Wood]] east of the [[High King's Road]].
